post.title: cdc solution disk v35.1
post.content: i own an eos 400d camera. all the software i got with the camera was succesfully installed on my computer. recently i purchased a powershot sx 110 is for my wife. i tried to install cdc solution disk v35.1 - but that seems impossible. the following message is displayed : you cannot install digital camera solution on this computer. verify whether the required environment for use has been satisfied. cancel installation.... i have windows xp professional 64bit?? thx for your reply p
